page.title: 09Village Life
page.content: {Mrs Garland}has lived in the village for 12 years. She lives in a small 300 year old{cottage}with a very pretty garden bordered by a mill stream which is above the level of the house.The cottage may have been a barn at one time. There are several steps up to the road outside. When she first came to the village there were no young families. There is no school in the village.{New houses have just been built in St.Michael's Close and there are to be 70 houses near Warlands lane. There are more children now but there is nothing in the village for them to do. Once along Mill Lane there used to be a butcher who slaughtered his own animals, a baker at the mill and a man who mended shoes. Everyone grew their own vegetables. There was no need to go out of the village.
